title: Forgot to cut hair after Umrah and reached Jeddah
transcript: ABD Kim's question she performed om alhamdulillah and she delayed postponing or postponed cutting her hair to get out of the state ofam until she reached jeda so what's the experation there's no experation you were still in the state ofam until you reached jida and you cut your hair by yourself this is acceptable and there's nothing wrong in that inshallah
